sentence.Network_en: Ford, though pushing 60, would return as the globe trotting archaeologist, occultist and Nazi - fighter.
sentence.Network_cn: 而已经年届60的影星哈里森·福特将继续出演踏遍全球的考古学家 、 探宝者和反纳粹斗士琼斯教授.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 神秘学家（occultist）与宗教家或宗教学家的区别在于神秘学者往往抱持开放的思维去接触、包容、吸纳各种不同思想流派；而宗教家 …

entry.def: An occultist is a person who believes in the supernatural and the power of magic.

means.word_mean: 1. a believer in occultism; someone versed in the occult arts

auth_sentence.content: I don't mean to sound like an occultist, but a little bit of strangeness is important to Manhattan.
